name: Shrimp Bisque
desc: A thick, orange-red soup. After stir-frying the spices, add the ingredients and simmer with broth until cooked. Up close, you'll catch a savory aroma laced with fiery, fragrant heat. The vibrant color of the broth whets the appetite at a glance, and it tastes even better.

value.text: Increases all party members' Healing Bonus by 17% for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).
